thread.title: GOP presidential contender Cruz to campaign in Michigan
thread.title_full: GOP presidential contender Cruz to campaign in Michigan

author: The Associated Press
title: GOP presidential contender Cruz to campaign in Michigan
text: October 5, 2015 GOP presidential contender Cruz to campaign in Michigan FILE - In this Sept. 25, 2015, file photo, Republican presidential candidate Sen. Ted Cruz, R-Texas speaks during the Values Voter Summit in Washington. Using Twitter to get a message out is now a must-do for presidential candidates, but looking at the accounts they follow can be instructive, too. Their follow list can reflect not only their personality and interests, but sometimes their strategy. Jose Luis Magana, File AP Photo i
